description: My place is close to 3rd Avenue and many great restaurants, Owl's Head Park, Narrows Park, the Verrazano Bridge, 69th Street Pier. You’ll love my place because of the coziness and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Cozy apartment for up to 3
review: James was an incredibly available and flexible host.
